flowchart TB
    subgraph RTLAmba["RTLAmba Library"]
        subgraph Core["Core Interfaces"]
            AXI4["AXI4\nFull/Master/Slave"]

        subgraph Monitor["Monitor Infrastructure"]
            MON_BASE["axi_monitor_base"]
            MON_TRANS["Transaction Manager"]
            MON_REPORT["Reporter"]
            MONBUS["Monitor Bus\n(64-bit packets)"]
        end

        subgraph Infrastructure["GAXI Infrastructure"]
            FIFO["FIFO\n(sync/async)"]
            SKID["Skid Buffer\n(sync/async)"]
            CDC["CDC Utilities"]
        end

        subgraph Utilities["Protocol Utilities"]
            ADDR["Address Generation"]
            SPLIT["Transaction Splitters"]
            DWIDTH["Data Width Convert"]
        end
    end

    AXI4 --> MON_BASE
    AXIL4 --> MON_BASE
    APB --> MON_BASE
    MON_BASE --> MON_TRANS
    MON_TRANS --> MON_REPORT
    MON_REPORT --> MONBUS

    Core --> Infrastructure
    Infrastructure --> Utilities
